thread.title: Check out the Top 5 honeymoon resort in Goa
thread.title_full: Check out the Top 5 honeymoon resort in Goa

author: Meenakshi25-2015-08-14T06:25:39-0400
title: Check out the Top 5 honeymoon resort in Goa
text:
Travel Articles | August 14, 2015 
Goa is a destination where honeymoon becomes special. The smallest state of India enjoys the beautiful coastline along the Arabian Sea. The beaches are romantic with stretches of white silky sands wit... 
Goa is a destination where honeymoon becomes special. The smallest state of India enjoys the beautiful coastline along the Arabian Sea. The beaches are romantic with stretches of white silky sands with waves of azure waters lapping the shore, water adventures, spellbinding sunsets, romantic candle light dinners on the beach and a whole lot of wonderful experiences. 
For memorable Honeymoon Vacation in Goa there are various lavish hotels, resorts and properties. They provide the right ambiance, amenities and the place to be romantic in the beautiful land of sun, sand & sea and experiences cherished forever. 
Check out the top 5 Honeymoon resorts in Goa : Alila Diwa Goa 
A 20 minutes drive from Goa Dabolim International Airport, Alila Diwa Goa is set amidst serene landscape of beaches, waters, lush palms and a whole lot of amenities. A honeymoon couple will be in love with the property and its cozy amenities which makes their holidays special. Hotel Cidade de Goa 
Luxury resort in Goa, Cidade de Goa is a beautiful beach resort in Pnajim. The views from the property are unrivalled. The amenities are international standard and the ambiance you have for honeymoon is peacil. Fall in love with each other and the property creates everything memorable. Indulge in sightseeing, adventures, dining and the soothing spas in your stay. 
Read more: Top 5 Exotic Beach Honeymoons near India The Leela Kempinski Goa 
Located in South Goa, The Leela Kempinski Goa is the ultimate beach honeymoon resort. The Portuguese architecture, the extravagant luxuries and world class facilities comined with the beautiful views of the Arabian Sea creates the right ambiance for romantic honeymoons. Vivanta by Taj – Fort Aguada 
Sited in Fort Aguada, Vivanat by Taj is a smolder beachfront property with luxury amenities. The ambiance is spectacular. Every corner has been careful created for cherished honeymoon vacations. Sightseeing, water sports, soothing spas are some luxuries. 
Read more: 10 Popular Resorts near Delhi NCR Taj Exotica Goa 
Honeymoon can’t be anything but more than special when you are staying at Taj Exotica Goa. The beautiful property has the recipe for wonderful honeymoon. Right from the views, the ambiance, luxury amenities and the blissful stay everything is special here. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
